meanings.definition: Relating to or containing the imino group.
meanings.sent1: The imino molecule showed unique properties in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the imino compounds found in nature.
meanings.sent3: The imino chemical reaction was so surprising that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The imino structure of the crystal was as intricate as a spider's web.
meanings.sent5: The imino characteristics of the substance made it stand out among others.

meanings.definition: A compound containing the imino group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized a new imino for the study.
meanings.sent2: I purchased an imino for my chemistry project.
meanings.sent3: The imino on the shelf looked like a tiny treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: His collection of iminos was a colorful garden of molecules.
meanings.sent5: The imino in the flask bubbled with excitement during the reaction.
